org.codehaus.preon
Class Codecs

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.preon.Codecs

public class Codecs
extends Object

A utility class, providing some convenience mechanisms for using and documenting Codecs.

Author:
Wilfred Springer

document

public static <T> void document(Codec<T> codec,
                                Codecs.DocumentType type,
                                File file)
                     throws FileNotFoundException
Documents the codec, writing a document of the given type to the given file.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of objects decoded by the Codec.
Parameters:
codec - The actual codec.
type - The type of document type of the document generated.
file - The file to which all output needs to be written.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - If the file cannot be written.

Type Parameters:

Parameters:
codec - The actual codec.
type - The type of document type of the document generated.
out - The OutputStream receiving the document.

Parameters:

Returns:
The decoded object.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - If the File does not exist.
IOException - If the system fails to read data from the file.
DecodingException - If the Codec fails to decode a value from the buffer passed in.

encode

public static <T> void encode(T value,
                              Codec<T> codec,
                              BitChannel channel)
                   throws IOException
Encodes the value to the channel passed in, using the given Codec. So why not have this operation on codec instead? Well, it is actually there. However, there will be quite a few overloaded versions of this operation, and Java would force you to implement these operations on every Codec. That's not a very attractive objection. So instead of inheritance, it's all delegation now.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of object to be encoded.
Parameters:
value - The object that needs to be encoded.
codec - The codec to be used.
channel - The target BitChannel.
Throws:
IOException - If the BitChannel no longer receives the data.

encode

                     throws IOException
Throws:
IOException

create

public static <T> Codec<T> create(Class<T> type)
Creates a Codec for the given type.

Type Parameters:
T - The of object constructed using the Codec.
Parameters:
type - The type of object constructed using the Codec.
Returns:
A Codec capable of decoding/encoding instances of the type passed in.

create

public static <T> Codec<T> create(Class<T> type,
                                  CodecFactory... factories)
Creates a Codec for the given type, accepting an number of CodecFactories to be taken into account while constructing the Codec.

Type Parameters:
T - The of object constructed using the Codec.
Parameters:
type - The type of object constructed using the Codec.
factories - Additional CodecFactories to be used while constructing the Codec.
Returns:
A Codec capable of decoding instances of the type passed in.

create

public static <T> Codec<T> create(Class<T> type,
                                  CodecDecorator... decorators)
Creates a Codec for the given type, accepting an number of CodecDecorators to be taken into account while constructing the Codec.

Type Parameters:
T - The type of object constructed using the Codec.
Parameters:
decorators - Additional CodecDecorators to be used while constructing the Codec.
Returns:
A Codec capable of decoding instances of the type passed in, taking the CodecDecorators into account.

Parameters:
